sentences.sContent: Any of the open spaces in a net or network; an interstice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any of the open spaces in a net or network; an interstice.
sentences.sCn: 网孔，空隙任一种网或网状物的镂空部分；空隙。

sentences.sContent: A small space or interstice in a tissue or part, such as the area bounded by small veins in a leaf or the wing of an insect.
sentences.sContent_eng: A small space or interstice in a tissue or part, such as the area bounded by small veins in a leaf or the wing of an insect.
sentences.sCn: 小区，细隙，叶脉网隙组织或部分的小空间或空隙，如叶子中的细脉或昆虫的翼周围的区域。

remMethod.val: inter(在…中间) + sti(站) + ice → 站在二者之间 → 空隙

trans.tranOther: a small space or crack in something or between things
